about_the_game:
A TIDE OF DESTINY AWAITS!

Peachleaf Valley: Tequa's Story is the third DLC content release for "Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love" featuring Tequa, Spirit of The Sea as a new romanceable bachelor!

Prepare to be swept away into a world where the ocean’s mysteries come alive. In Tequa’s Story, dive deep into the legends of mermaids, ancient seafolk, and the lost realms of Atlantis. As the king of the ocean’s depths, Tequa is both stern and awe-inspiring, carrying with him the weight of tides and centuries-old secrets. 🌊🧜‍♀️

Uncover a story of fierce love, resilience, and boundless loyalty as you venture with Tequa into an underwater realm teeming with fantastical creatures and breathtaking beauty. Every encounter reveals a deeper, hidden world woven with the magic of the sea and the mythos of a forgotten age. 🐚✨

  • Interactive Romance – Dive into in thrilling, choice-driven interactions that bring you closer to the Spirit of the Sea and the mysteries he guards.

  • Captivating (Optional) Animations – Enjoy dynamic animations that immerse you in Tequa’s world, from ocean tides to mystical sea creatures. With our customizable accessibility menu, you can tailor animations to suit your preferences, ensuring an experience as immersive—or streamlined—as you’d like. Craft your ideal playthrough and enjoy Peachleaf Valley your way!

  • Beautiful Background Illustrations – Journey through vivid, hand-drawn backgrounds capturing the majesty of Tequa’s domain, from enchanted coral reefs to the ruins of Atlantis.

  • Mesmerizing CG Moments – Collect CGs that capture Tequa’s most intense moments, blending romance and the deep, mysterious beauty of the sea.

  • Partial Voice Acting – Experience Tequa’s commanding presence through performances by professional voice actors, adding a powerful, emotional depth to each scene.

  • New Music Tracks – Dive into exclusive tracks that evoke the magic and mystery of the sea, immersing you in Tequa’s world.

  • AND Exclusive New Characters and Locations to explore in the Valley!

Peachleaf Valley: Tequa's Story is the third DLC content release for "Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love" featuring Tequa, Spirit of The Sea as a new romanceable bachelor!

fullgame.name: Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love - a farming inspired otome

name: Peachleaf Valley: Tequa's Story (DLC)
short_description: Peachleaf Valley: Tequa's Story is the third DLC for Peachleaf Valley featuring Tequa, Spirit of The Sea! It features the story and ability to romance Tequa, King of the Seas, whose fate carries the tides and centuries-old secrets of the underwater realm, Atlantis.🌊🐚
